amendment.description: Amendment repeals the statutory requirement that the United States defense attache to France must hold the rank of brigadier general or rear admiral, lower half.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 108-120 to insert a new section providing for repeal of required grade of defense attache' in France.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Saxton amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 302 - 123 (Roll no. 218).
